metadata.title: CVE-2020-6813 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
When protecting CSS blocks with the nonce feature of Content SecurityPolicy, the @import statement in the CSS block could allow an attacker toinject arbitrary styles, bypassing the intent of the Content SecurityPolicy. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 74.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '74.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
